media_attachments.description:
The vegetable patch, protected by the net.
The net is a bit loose and slopes so the hailsones just bounce on it and roll down on the side harmlessly.

descendants.content: @juc Oh, wow. I would not have guessed that it can protect against big hail stones. Great!
